fields.description:
After recovering from full bukkits issue on Walrus, a couple of hours later, instances failed to launch.  

The steps in recovering from the bukkits being full (while cloud was running):

* Added a new resource into the DRBD config to use a block device that had more storage
* Copied the information from the current resource that Walrus was using.
* Did a euca-modify-property to change the resource backing of Walrus to use the new block device

After performing these steps, and making sure DRBD was in the right state (regarding primary/secondary roles), the cloud was running fine (i.e. instances were being launched, new buckets created, etc.).

ENABLED as seen in euca-describe-services was primary and mounted correctly. DISABLED system was secondary and unmounted. DRBD state was fine.

Error started to show up on the primary Walrus:

{code}
edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.cloud.entities.DRBDInfo.getDRBDInfo(DRBDInfo.java:126)
                                                      |         at edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.storage.fs.DRBDStorageManager.checkLocalDisk(DRBDStorageManager.java:276)
                                                      |         at edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.storage.fs.DRBDStorageManager.becomeSlave(DRBDStorageManager.java:323)
                                                      |         at edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.storage.fs.DRBDStorageManager.disable(DRBDStorageManager.java:367)
{code}

Additional errors:

{code}
        ... 33 more
Thu Feb 7 11:54:26 2013  WARN Tracker                 | bttrack not found (bittorrent installed?). Torrent support disabled (non critical).
Thu Feb 7 11:54:27 2013  WARN DRBDStorageManager      | Warning! Peer is not primary. No usable component?
Thu Feb 7 11:54:27 2013 ERROR ServiceTransitions      | arn:euca:eucalyptus:escloc54_1:cluster:escloc54_1_cc_b/ failed transition CHECK because of com.eucalyptus.util.async.RetryableConnectionException: Channel was closed before the write operation could be completed: Connection refused:GetKeysType:null:return=true:epoch=null:status=null
Thu Feb 7 11:54:27 2013 ERROR Topology                | START:DISABLED  arn:euca:eucalyptus:escloc54_1:cluster:escloc54_1_cc_b/ INITIALIZED->DISABLED=NOTREADY [Connection refused]
Thu Feb 7 11:54:27 2013  WARN StorageProperties       | Could not obtain walrus information. Snapshot functionality may be unavailable. Have you registered Walrus?
Thu Feb 7 11:54:27 2013  INFO BlockStorageStatistics  | Service: StorageController Version: 3.1.2 Volumes: 132 Space Used: 5870146551808
{code}

After stopping the eucalyptus-cloud services on the secondary CLC/Walrus, and doing a restart of eucalyptus-cloud services on the primary CLC/Walrus, the following errors showed up:

{code}
cloud-debug.log.1::1360237467435:ClusterAllocator:d9710378-6c3f-4e27-852a-36093e0ad03c:arn:aws:euare::272083517827:user/admin:VM_PREPARE:[/euca:RunInstancesType] ownerFullName=arn:aws:euare:272083517827:user/admin userData=null minCount=1 maxCount=1 usePrivateAddressing=false partition=Partition:name=acme_1:cc-cert-serial=3854945194070215:nc-cert-serial=3854968948994420 sshKeyPair=SshKeyPair:000000000001:nokey:fingerPrint= bootSet=BootableSet:machine=arn:aws:euca:eucalyptus:272083517827:image/emi-AC3C3D80/:ramdisk=arn:aws:euca:eucalyptus:000000000001:image/eri-7AE9372E/:kernel=arn:aws:euca:eucalyptus:000000000001:image/eki-DF223ACC/:isLinux=true vmType=VmType m1.small cores=1 disk=10 mem=1700 primaryNetwork=NetworkRulesGroup:272083517827:admintj:description=admintj:networkRules=[NetworkRule:tcp:22:22:ipRanges=[0.0.0.0/0]:networkPeers=[]:] networkGroups=[admintj:NetworkRulesGroup:272083517827:admintj:description=admintj:networkRules=[NetworkRule:tcp:22:22:ipRanges=[0.0.0.0/0]:networkPeers=[]:]] reservationId=r-4BED3FE4 allocationTokens=[ResourceToken:i-4C4E4429:100.xxx.xxx.115:tag=826:idx=27] reservationIndex=13957 instanceIds=[0:i-4C4E4429] expiration=Wed Jan 01 10:00:00 EET 3000]
cloud-debug.log.1:Thu Feb 7 13:44:27 2013 ERROR [StatefulMessageSet:Eucalyptus.cluster:ClusterConfiguration:arn:euca:eucalyptus:acme_1:cluster:acme_1_cc_b/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#252] [com.eucalyptus.util.async.StatefulMessageSet.transition(StatefulMessageSet.java):122] java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.util.NoSuchElementException: An error occurred while trying to lookup vm instance i-4C4E4429: could not execute query
cloud-debug.log.1:java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.util.NoSuchElementException: An error occurred while trying to lookup vm instance i-4C4E4429: could not execute query
cloud-debug.log.1:Caused by: java.util.NoSuchElementException: An error occurred while trying to lookup vm instance i-4C4E4429: could not execute query
cloud-error.log.1:Thu Feb 7 13:44:27 2013 ERROR [StatefulMessageSet:Eucalyptus.cluster:ClusterConfiguration:arn:euca:eucalyptus:acme_1:cluster:acme_1_cc_b/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#252] [com.eucalyptus.util.async.StatefulMessageSet.transition(StatefulMessageSet.java):122] java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.util.NoSuchElementException: An error occurred while trying to lookup vm instance i-4C4E4429: could not execute query
cloud-error.log.1:java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.util.NoSuchElementException: An error occurred while trying to lookup vm instance i-4C4E4429: could not execute query
cloud-error.log.1:Caused by: java.util.NoSuchElementException: An error occurred while trying to lookup vm instance i-4C4E4429: could not execute query
cloud-output.log.1:                                                      | :1360237467435:ClusterAllocator:d9710378-6c3f-4e27-852a-36093e0ad03c:arn:aws:euare::272083517827:user/admin:VM_PREPARE:[/euca:RunInstancesType] ownerFullName=arn:aws:euare:272083517827:user/admin userData=null minCount=1 maxCount=1 usePrivateAddressing=false partition=Partition:name=acme_1:cc-cert-serial=3854945194070215:nc-cert-serial=3854968948994420 sshKeyPair=SshKeyPair:000000000001:nokey:fingerPrint= bootSet=BootableSet:machine=arn:aws:euca:eucalyptus:272083517827:image/emi-AC3C3D80/:ramdisk=arn:aws:euca:eucalyptus:000000000001:image/eri-7AE9372E/:kernel=arn:aws:euca:eucalyptus:000000000001:image/eki-DF223ACC/:isLinux=true vmType=VmType m1.small cores=1 disk=10 mem=1700 primaryNetwork=NetworkRulesGroup:272083517827:admintj:description=admintj:networkRules=[NetworkRule:tcp:22:22:ipRanges=[0.0.0.0/0]:networkPeers=[]:] networkGroups=[admintj:NetworkRulesGroup:272083517827:admintj:description=admintj:networkRules=[NetworkRule:tcp:22:22:ipRanges=[0.0.0.0/0]:networkPeers=[]:]] reservationId=r-4BED3FE4 allocationTokens=[ResourceToken:i-4C4E4429:100.xxx.xxx.115:tag=826:idx=27] reservationIndex=13957 instanceIds=[0:i-4C4E4429] expiration=Wed Jan 01 10:00:00 EET 3000]
cloud-output.log.1:Thu Feb 7 13:44:27 2013 ERROR StatefulMessageSet      | java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.util.NoSuchElementException: An error occurred while trying to lookup vm instance i-4C4E4429: could not execute query
cloud-output.log.1:java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.util.NoSuchElementException: An error occurred while trying to lookup vm instance i-4C4E4429: could not execute query
cloud-output.log.1:Caused by: java.util.NoSuchElementException: An error occurred while trying to lookup vm instance i-4C4E4429: could not execute query
{code}

After launching an instance, the following error showed up:

{code}
cloud-debug.log.1:Thu Feb 7 13:39:00 2013 ERROR [StatefulMessageSet:Eucalyptus.cluster:ClusterConfiguration:arn:euca:eucalyptus:acme_1:cluster:acme_1_cc_b/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#249] [com.eucalyptus.util.async.StatefulMessageSet.transition(StatefulMessageSet.java):122] java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.util.NoSuchElementException: An error occurred while trying to lookup vm instance i-5327427E: could not execute query
cloud-debug.log.1:java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.util.NoSuchElementException: An error occurred while trying to lookup vm instance i-5327427E: could not execute query
cloud-debug.log.1:Caused by: java.util.NoSuchElementException: An error occurred while trying to lookup vm instance i-5327427E: could not execute query
cloud-debug.log.1:Thu Feb 7 13:39:01 2013  WARN [VmInstance:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:Callbacks:class com.eucalyptus.util.async.Callbacks$BasicCallbackProcessor.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#177] [com.eucalyptus.vm.VmInstance$RestoreAllocation.restoreNetworkIndex(VmInstance.java):415] Failed to recover network index for i-5327427E because no network group information is available: []
cloud-debug.log.1:Thu Feb 7 13:39:01 2013 ERROR [VmInstance:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:Callbacks:class com.eucalyptus.util.async.Callbacks$BasicCallbackProcessor.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#177] [com.eucalyptus.vm.VmInstance$RestoreAllocation.restoreImage(VmInstance.java):568] Failed to lookup imageId  for: i-5327427E because of: Failed to find virtual boot record of type machine among: []
{code}

Looking at these errors, it looks like the issues filed and resolved in 3.2 in the following ticket:

* EUCA-4108
* EUCA-3795

We see these additional errors in the cloud-debug.log file:

{code}
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.10:Thu Feb 7 09:55:48 2013  INFO [VmInstance:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:Callbacks:class com.eucalyptus.util.async.Callbacks$BasicCallbackProcessor.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#274] [com.eucalyptus.vm.VmInstance$RestoreAllocation.restoreNetworkIndex(VmInstance.java):425] Found matching extant network for i-D22A43AD: ExtantNetwork:default:tag=705:indexes=[]:
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.10:Thu Feb 7 09:55:49 2013  INFO [VmInstance:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:Callbacks:class com.eucalyptus.util.async.Callbacks$BasicCallbackProcessor.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#274] [com.eucalyptus.vm.VmInstance$RestoreAllocation.restoreNetworkIndex(VmInstance.java):425] Found matching extant network for i-4B9F3F3D: ExtantNetwork:default:tag=705:indexes=[]:
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.10:Thu Feb 7 09:55:52 2013  INFO [VmInstance:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:Callbacks:class com.eucalyptus.util.async.Callbacks$BasicCallbackProcessor.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#274] [com.eucalyptus.vm.VmInstance$RestoreAllocation.restoreNetworkIndex(VmInstance.java):425] Found matching extant network for i-D22A43AD: ExtantNetwork:default:tag=705:indexes=[]:
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.10:Thu Feb 7 09:55:53 2013  INFO [VmInstance:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:Callbacks:class com.eucalyptus.util.async.Callbacks$BasicCallbackProcessor.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#274] [com.eucalyptus.vm.VmInstance$RestoreAllocation.restoreNetworkIndex(VmInstance.java):425] Found matching extant network for i-4B9F3F3D: ExtantNetwork:default:tag=705:indexes=[]:
{code}

After seeing these errors, cleanstop/cleanstart of eucalyptus-cc service on ENABLED and DISABLED CCs.
fields.summary: After recovering from full bukkits on HA cloud, instances aren't able to be launched

comments.body: This was fixed in the field.  The issue was resolved by sending a euca-terminate-instances of all the instances IDs showing up in the cloud-debug.log.
Issues marked fixed in currently released versions of the software. Moving to Closed fixed
